settings.title: Hydrating Electrolyte Mix
settings.content: Hydration is the foundation of health. With 4x the electrolytes of leading sports drinks, Cure restores balance to your body so you can operate at 100%.

settings.label: Hydration
settings.title: Hydration is the foundation of health. But science shows that staying hydrated often requires more than water alone. That’s why we made our Hydrating Electrolyte Mix.

settings.label: Energy
settings.title: Caffeine is our go-to source of energy, whether we’re starting our day, working out, or hitting that afternoon slump. But your caffeine should be doing more than just waking you up. That’s why we made our Energizing Drink Mixes.
Dr. Dana Cohen
settings.content: Dana G. Cohen, MD has been practicing integrative medicine for the last 20 years in Manhattan. She is a nationally renowned internal and integrative medicine specialist whose multi-disciplinary approach has helped treat thousands of patients using a variety of conventional and complementary therapies. She has co-authored QUENCH: Beat Fatigue, Drop Weight, and Heal Your Body Through the New Science of Optimum Hydration.

settings.title: Brooke Alpert
settings.content: Brooke Alpert, M.S., R.D., C.D.N., is a nationally recognized nutrition expert and a best-selling author. She is the founder of B Nutritious, a private nutrition counseling and consulting practice in New York City. Brooke has been featured on Good Morning America, the Dr. Oz Show and the TODAY Show.

settings.title: Dr. Roshini Raj
settings.content: Dr. Roshini Raj is a board-certified gastroenterologist and attending physician at NYU Medical Center. Dr. Raj is a Medical Editor of Health Magazine, Dr. Oz core expert and regular contributor to the TODAY Show, CNN, FNC and Inside Edition.

settings.title: Meet the doctors and nutritionists behind Cure.

settings.heading: FOR WARMER CLIMATES
settings.text: “I live in sunny California and enjoy spending my time outside and exercising. I feel the difference in my energy level when I'm fully hydrated. Cure is the only electrolyte I’ve ever liked! They had me at coconut water and no sugar added!”
settings.author:
– Abbie,
San Clemente, CA

settings.heading: FOR WORKOUTS
settings.text: “I use Cure pre/intra/post workout. It keeps me hydrated, and the variety of flavors makes it much more enjoyable. The little packets are also easy to keep in my gym bag and virtually take up no space.”
settings.author:
– Dennis,
Buffalo Grove, IL

settings.heading: FOR PARENTS
settings.text: “I’m a mom of three and always on the go! I use Cure any time of day when I need to get more water in. It makes drinking enough water in a day a breeze and it tastes great!"
settings.author:
– Jess,
Groveland, CA

settings.heading: FOR FITNESS ENTHUSIASTS
settings.text: "I love Cure! When I stumbled upon it, I was so relieved to finally find a hydration mix that wasn't full of junk and replenished my body with electrolytes. So many other options out there are full of added sugar and other questionable ingredients...no thank you! I'm an avid Peloton user, workout most days, chase 2 toddlers around every day, and I can't recommend this brand enough."
settings.author:
– Megan,
Knoxville, TN

settings.heading: FOR PREGNANCY
settings.text: "Hydration is important during all stages of life but even more important during pregnancy. Water often isn't enough to keep us adequately hydrated and I feel good knowing the ingredients in Cure are not only safe for me but also for my growing baby. Staying hydrated can help with morning sickness, swelling, and even regular bowel movements. I look forward to drinking it everyday!"
settings.author:
– Brittany,
Spring, TX

settings.heading: FOR YOUR DAILY ROUTINE
settings.text: “While I incorporated Cure into my routine as a fitness instructor and athlete, it was an absolute game changer for pregnancy and now breastfeeding! I love that it tastes amazing and is low in sugar. Highly recommend including this product in your daily routine, especially if you struggle with hydration!”
settings.author:
– Jacquie,
New York, NY

settings.heading: FOR HIGH ALTITUDES
settings.text: "Cure is my go-to electrolyte mix for all outdoor activities but mainly for when I’m in the desert. The dry Utah conditions deplete my energy all around, and having the instant packets on hand helps keep me hydrated. I typically drink one right after any activity. I love that Cure has no added sugar as well. 5 stars!"
settings.author:
– Alicia,
Salt Lake City, UT
